text: The BYD Xia is a large luxury Minivan made by BYD since 2025. == History and Features == The BYD Xia was launched in 2025 it was named after the Xia dynasty its part of a series of vehicles of BYD called "dynasty" and is sold through dynasty network's dealerships it has options of six seven and eight seats the Xia is a Plug-in hybrid having a 1.5 liter petrol engine that is combined with a electric motor with a E-CVT transmission. == Markets == The BYD Xia was first released in China BYD said it has plans to sell it in Europe. == References == Xia Category:2020s automobiles Category:Minivans Category:Chinese automobiles
title: BYD Xia
